context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. Cloud security and container scanning.

competitors.name: Tenable
competitors.notes: Direct competitor with Nessus vulnerability scanner and Nexpose (later InsightVM). Tenable competed strongly with both on-premises and cloud-based vulnerability management solutions, known for extensive CVE coverage.

competitors.name: Rapid7
competitors.notes: Competitor in vulnerability management and penetration testing with Nexpose product and Metasploit framework. Rapid7 offered data security and analytics solutions including vulnerability management, incident detection, and response.

competitors.name: Symantec (Broadcom)
competitors.notes: Security vendor offering cloud penetration testing and vulnerability management capabilities as part of comprehensive security solutions.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise security provider with vulnerability management capabilities through ISS acquisition, competing in the enterprise vulnerability assessment market.

competitors.name: OpenVAS
competitors.notes: Open-source vulnerability scanner and manager, presenting a free alternative to Qualys' commercial cloud-based offerings.

competitors.name: Micro Focus
competitors.notes: Security vendor offering vulnerability management and security solutions for enterprise customers.
